text: The ambience was great. Good for a family quick bite. Ordering was easy and their serving was fast.

easy ordering and payment system, just scan QR to order. the menu is clear and pages load very quickly. after placing order, drinks came pretty fast. the prawn noodle soup is very thick and flavourful. Assam laksa was rather disappointing, soup is neither spicy nor sourish enough. no other ingredients except a piece of sardine which is still cold inside.
I was quickly seated. Service staff is polite and efficient. Food is delicious, as expected of Old Town. There is oat milk option for their Kopi. Wonderful for the lactose intolerant!
They have healthy choices like no sugar lime juice and Ipoh chicken Hor fun. You can customise your meal too!! The Hor fun is really good!
The food is very nice! Came rly quick :) great service too
